title: I need help.
body:
When I play I mostly carry my teams and climb Elo but they just feed and troll. My goal is to get silver and I can't get that if my team trolls. Do I need to play better and carry more ??? 

Plz help

replies.body: Also I'm not play ranked until next season and my goal is silver so is their anyway you could help me 2?

I just did, you need to focus on farming a bit better (No matter who told you, scores don't lie)
You die way too much, just focus on objectives.

The channels I linked have some educational vids.

All you have to do is complete rune pages, and gain more experience.
I don't think you can reach silver this season, but you should be able to get it easily next season.

Once you've practiced a bit, and gained more runes.
hey dude i sort of have the same problem can u give me some tips

play champs you are comfortable with, you have 63% win ratio with Lux over 51 games. thats your highest win ratio with a champ, i know it might be boring, but if you wanna climb, just play lux, the numbers dont lie.

edit: your Sejuani is 73% win ratio out of 14 games  and Zac 63% out of 24.

Queue Jungle/Mid (or supp wherever you take Lux) play Sej/Zac/Lux
i find with lux tho shes no good late where i usually end up

You were silver last season, and you High Bronze now.
Your runes seem ok, Not sure about masteries. (I only skimmed through em)
I noticed you had thunderlords on a jungler page, this is kinda meh. It only works if the invade is successful, but it drops off mid to late game.
Might wanna swap to strength instead, because you get more HP, and heals later on.
(it can work, just one is more reliable than the other)

CSing could use work.
You've forgotten to change/Upgrade trinkets.
Don't buy a stacking item (Majias) if your score is even or feeding (You score was even making the item useless)
You have alot of wins, I think you just dont know how to turn the tides.
You might also give up easily, and become toxic. (I dont know)
I think if you work on those, you should be fine.
I had a look at your channel and watch a couple vids. Yes I will focus on getting more Cs and not being greedy. But thank you for your help

Well, your CS is very poor.
Recommend going into customs/bot games and trying to get.
60 CS per 10 mins, minimum.
to 80 CS per 10 Mins.

in some games I don't think you itemize correctly, and I think you greed for kills.
Try not to die as much, in most games you even to negative.

And here is where I found your problem.
You have 200 Norm wins, that's nothing really. Recommend getting at least 400, minimum.
And you only have 2 rune pages, and BOTH are incomplete.
You have no runes at all, or experience.
You need to fix these two things first.

Would I be able to add you ??

Can if you wish, the clubs are broken right now.
So I can't add you to the Helping Others Club.
I'm Uploading right now, but later I can try and spectate a game.
I still think you should just play normals for now.
I was told I'm a good farmer. I do get 50 mins per ten mins most game and I'm working on my rune pages
